features: An intricately designed choker featuring a cascading pattern of diamonds and gemstone studded floral motifs. The design incorporates a central pendant drop featuring a pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by diamonds and pearls. The graduating layers create a dramatic and regal effect, perfect for bridal wear. The delicate pearl drops provide a soft, elegant touch.
occasions: and High-end gala events. Suitable for any occasion where you want to showcase exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance.
description: This exceptional choker embodies the finest craftsmanship of Hyderabad. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, rubies and pearls creates a stunning visual masterpiece. The intricate design reflects traditional South Indian jewelry techniques while incorporating a modern aesthetic. This piece is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom to be treasured for generations. The high gold purity and use of natural gemstones ensure lasting value and beauty.
